00344   if(is_cube_generator<eop_cube_type>::value == true)
00345     {
00346           eT* out_mem = out.memptr();
00347     const u32 n_elem  = x.n_elem;
00348     
00349     for(u32 i=0; i<n_elem; ++i)
00350       {
00351       out_mem[i] /= eop_aux::generate<eT,eop_cube_type>();
00352       }
00353     }
00354   else
00355     {
00356           eT*            out_mem = out.memptr();
00357     const ProxyCube<T1>& P       = x.P;
00358     const u32            n_elem  = x.n_elem;
00359     
00360     for(u32 i=0; i<n_elem; ++i)
00361       {
00362       out_mem[i] /= eop_cube_core<eop_cube_type>::process(x, P[i]);
00363       }
00364     }
00365   }
